nodes.text: Kadri'Ra was the native language of the Kadri'Ra race.
It was dismissed by Imperial historians as the "indigent dialect of an intellectually inferior species".

The Kadri'Ra crime lord Saadoon-Kauldi spoke only in his native tongue by choice and his personal attendant, the former slave and Devaronian Guzald, was one of the few individuals who could understand the language.
